item.title: Upgrade a PostgreSQL container to a new major version
item.author: felix.niederwanger@suse.de (phoenix)
item.description: PostgreSQL is a capable and mature database, which comes in a major or minor version number (e.g. 16.0). Minor releases never change the internal storage, so the database always remains compatible with earlier and later minor releases.
